channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Unanimous Supreme Court sides with Ohio woman who claimed workplace discrimination
item.description: The court sided with an Ohio woman who claimed she was discriminated against at work because she is straight.

item.title: Israel says it recovered the bodies of 2 U.S.-Israeli hostages
item.description: The bodies of Judi Weinstein Haggai, 70, an Israeli who held U.S. and Canadian citizenship, and her husband, Gad Haggai, 72, a dual U.S.-Israeli citiz...

item.title: Unanimous Supreme Court rules against Mexico in guns case
item.description: The Court dismissed Mexico's claim that U.S. gun manufacturers aided and abetted the pipeline of weapons from the U.S. to Mexican drug cartels.

item.title: Unanimous Supreme Court sides with Catholic Charities in Wisconsin case
item.description: A unanimous Supreme Court ruled that Catholic Charities can opt out of participating in a state unemployment compensation program in Wisconsin.

item.title: China says Trump and Xi talked on the phone, their first call since the tariff war began
item.description: It's the first known call between the two leaders since Inauguration Day — and the first time they've spoken since tariffs began ratcheting up.

item.title: What we know about Trump's latest travel ban
item.description: President Donald Trump signs a proclamation banning nationals from 12 countries from travelling to the US.

item.title: Former Zambian President Lungu dies aged 68
item.description: He had "been receiving specialized treatment in South Africa", his party says.

item.title: What we know about Trump's latest travel ban
item.description: President Donald Trump signs a proclamation banning nationals from 12 countries from travelling to the US.

item.title: Vigil held for victims of Boulder firebombing attack as suspect’s family fights deportation
6/5: CBS Morning News
item.description: Trump announces travel ban on 12 countries; Beyoncé highlights forgotten piece of American history on Cowboy Carter Tour.

item.title: US Supreme Court rejects Mexico lawsuit against gunmakers
item.description: The suit accused gunmakers of contributing to Mexico's gun violence struggles and challenged a US shield law.

item.title: Trump’s EPA targets environmental rules projected to save billions — and many thousands of lives
How to qualify for medical debt forgiveness
item.description: Struggling with medical bills? Here's how to qualify for forgiveness (and what to do if you don't meet the criteria).

item.title: Trump speaks to China's Xi on trade, says talks will resume soon
item.description: President Trump spoke to Chinese President Xi Jinping on Thursday amid an ongoing dispute over a temporary deal to ease the escalation of tariffs.

item.title: Eight injured on Ryanair flight hit by 'severe turbulence', police say
item.description: The flight's captain called ahead for medical assistance and the plane "landed normally" in southern Germany.

item.title: Supreme Court issues rulings on reverse discrimination, gunmaker liability | Special Report
item.description: The Supreme Court is issuing several rulings before the end of its term. The justices ruled unanimously in favor of an Ohio woman who sought legal act...

item.title: Brianne Howey and Antonia Gentry return for "Ginny & Georgia" Season 3
item.description: Brianne Howey and Antonia Gentry join "CBS Mornings" and "CBS Mornings Plus" to discuss what's ahead for "Ginny & Georgia" as the comedy-drama returns...

item.title: Governments scramble to understand Trump’s latest travel ban before it takes effect Monday
item.description: Governments of 12 countries whose citizens will be banned from visiting the United States starting next week are scrambling to understand President Do...
